question: What is Fulflow.io?
answer: Fulflow.io is our in-house, custom-built fulfillment software designed to centralize and streamline every part of the fulfillment process. From tracking inventory and managing orders to monitoring shipments in real time, Fulflow.io gives you full visibility and control in one easy-to-use platform. It’s the engine behind everything we do at Rapid Flow Fulfillment.

question: How do I know when you have received my inventory?
answer: Once we receive your inventory, it will be logged and uploaded into your dashboard on FulFlow.io—our custom software. You’ll automatically get a notification so you’re always in the loop.

question: Is there a minimum order requirement?
answer: No, we don’t have a minimum order requirement. Whether you’re just getting started or already scaling, we work with businesses of all sizes. Our goal is to support your growth—no matter where you are in your journey.

question: What are your prices?
answer: We offer customized solutions tailored to each client’s unique needs, so we don’t have a standard pricing sheet. Reach out to us for a free consultation, and we’ll provide a detailed quote based on your specific fulfillment requirements.

question: Do you sell products?
answer: Yes. While our main focus is fulfillment and logistics, we also offer product distribution and sourcing options. This allows us to not only store and ship inventory for our clients but also provide select products directly to customers and partners — creating a streamlined, multi-channel solution for growth.

question: Where services do you offer?
answer: We offer a full spectrum of 3PL services—including all types of fulfillment (FBA, FBM, DTC, wholesale), returns processing, and secure storage. Whether you’re shipping to Amazon, directly to customers, or handling bulk B2B orders, we’ve got you covered. From start to finish, we really do it all.

question: What is your turnaround time?
answer: Our standard turnaround time is 24 to 48 hours max. We pride ourselves on being one of the fastest in the industry—ensuring your store metrics stay strong and your customers stay happy. Speed and reliability are at the core of what we do.

question: Where are your warehouses located?
answer: We operate from our main strategic hub in New Jersey. We are working on expansion hubs in California and Florida.
